Qed.```

- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

```coq
intros.
assert (x < find_pow2 x) by (apply find_pow2_geq; auto).
assert (x < pow2 (S (loop (Init.Nat.pred x) x))) by (apply loop_prop; auto).
rewrite <- pow2_succ in H0.
apply le_trans with (pow2 (find_pow2 x)); auto.
Qed.
